mind.name: Emerge
mind.desc: The delicate buds are always carefully protected, but they also want to walk to the frontline and be side by side with her, even if they would be on tiptoe.

memory.name: Vapor
memory.desc: As hazy as transpiring vapor, are the so-called past events just illusions in dreams?

belief.name: Shadowing
belief.desc: You have to trot to keep up with her, but if you do fall behind, she'll be waiting for you not far away.
